column5: I just updated my Firefox and everything is in French...not that there's anything wrong with that...but I prefer the English version...Computer is set to English & re-started ..yet my browser and searches are all still in French??? Does anybody know how I can fix it ? <"""><   Thank You!! RFS     NEVER MIND IT'S FIXED........  It fixed itself ?   RFS

if anyone else has the problem  in tools options make sure you lag tab is english if that does not work are you logging on some sites in frnch, like maybe facebook it can make your computer think you are a francophone  you will need to delete all cookies and it might fix your problem

si quelqu'un d'autre a le problème  dans les options des outils assurez-vous de lag onglet est l'anglais Si cela ne fonctionne pas Etes-vous l'exploitation forestière sur certains sites dans Frnch, comme peut être facebook il peut rendre votre ordinateur pense que vous êtes un francophone  vous devez supprimer tous les cookies et l'on pourrait régler votre problème
Thank goodness yall are speaking french I though my glasses went bad for a minute.   Art
reminds me of products with translations from chinese, just not right
